title: Improve Final Comments Error Handling & UX
description: Surface backend error messages and preserve modal content when save errors occur

complexity.reasoning: 3 user stories, localized to FinalCommentsModal component, frontend-only changes, no API modifications required, simple error state management and UI improvement, ~1-2 weeks effort

rationale: Critical UX issue - users lose data on save errors and receive no helpful error messages. This reduces support burden and improves user satisfaction.

list: US-1: Display Backend Error Messages to User
US-2: Preserve Modal Content When Error Occurs
US-3: Display Error Near Save Action
